CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(NKS_Experience_Site_Source__c, 'Fedrekvotesaken'), 'Fedrekvotesaken: Kvittering', IF( CRM_Type__c = 'STO' || CRM_Type__c = 'STB' || CRM_Type__c = 'BTO', ( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(NKS_Inbox_Type__c)), NKS_Inbox_Type__c, IF(CRM_Type__c = 'BTO', 'Beskjed til oss', 'Skriv til oss') ) & ' - ' & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c)), IF( OR( AND(CONTAINS(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c, "Helse"), CONTAINS(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c, "Pleiepenger")), AND(CONTAINS(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c, "Familie"), CONTAINS(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c, "Pleiepenger")) ), MID(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c, FIND("-", NKS_Inbox_Theme__c) + 1, LEN(NKS_Inbox_Theme__c)), NKS_Inbox_Theme__c ), CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name ) & IF(ISBLANK(CRM_Closed_Date__c), '', ': Henvendelsen er avsluttet') ), IF( ISPICKVAL(CRM_Thread_Type__c, 'AAREG_EXP'), AAREG_Thread_Subject__c, 'Chat' ) ) )
CustomField.label: STO - External Name
